dent.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a hollow area in the surface of something, usually made by something hitting it
dent.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: There was a large dent in the passenger door.
dent.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a reduction in the amount of something
dent.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The trip made a big dent in our savings.
Eight years of effort have hardly put a dent in drug trafficking.
dent.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: if you dent something, or if it dents, you hit or press it so that its surface is bent inwards
dent.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: No one was injured, but the car was scratched and dented.
dent.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The scandal has dented his reputation.
